# Equal And Opposite [Force](Force.qmd) Pairs
- "When one body exerts a [force](Force.qmd) on a second body, the second body simultaneously exerts a [force](Force.qmd) equal in magnitude and opposite in direction on the first body."
- $$F_{1}= -F_{2}$$
